text.div:
This code system http://linuxforhealth.org/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/payer-subscriber-relationship defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
childother The beneficiary can only be identified as a child or other dependent of the Subscriber.

name: PayerSubscriberRelationshipCodeSystem
title: Payer Subscriber Relationship Codes
description: Payer subscriber relationship value set for the relationship of the member to the contract holder

concept.display: The beneficiary can only be identified as a child or other dependent of the Subscriber.
